thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 51 of 1961
thread.title: PA

author: PA
title: PA
text:
Placed online order and got a call immediately to say that they didn't have 4 tyres in stock at price I was Quote: d. Although I was pleased to get the call it did mean I had to pay more so not satisfied with that. The website should have made it clear that the quantity wasn't available.
The actual fitting service was excellent. Received an email with 2 hrs slot. I also received a call to say the arrival time. 4 tyres fitted within an hour so very impressed.
